# Basic Tasks Test File

This file contains basic tasks with various status markers.

## Simple Tasks

- [ ] Not done task
- [x] Done task
- [/] In progress task
- [-] Cancelled task
- [Q] Question task

## More Examples

- [ ] Another not done task
- [x] Another completed task
- [ ] Yet another pending task

## With Descriptions

- [ ] Buy groceries at the store
- [x] Completed the weekly report
- [/] Working on the presentation
